subject: Urgent: Your Account is at Risk!

subject: Free Offer: Get a Loan Today!

subject: Meeting Reminder: Join ASAP

subject: Urgent: Action Required

subject: Important Project Update
body: Here's the latest update on the project. Let me know if you need anything else!

subject: Plans for the Weekend
body: Are we still going to the trip this weekend? Let me know when you’re free!
